description:
Cinnamon and Ichiko watch a horror movie, leading to all the expected consequences. Lucky and Boo rekindle old rivalries.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gourmet Battle?! I`m Not Compromising on This Flavor!!!
Gourmet Taiketsu!? Yuzurenai Aji ga Anda yo!!!
معركة الأطعمة؟! لن أتنازل عن هذه النكهة
グルメ対決!? 譲れない味があんだよ!!!
